column2: Service Properties Trust is a real estate investment trust, which engages in the provision of hospitality and travel services. The company is headquartered in Newton, Massachusetts and currently employs 0 full-time employees. The firm's properties are located in over 45 states in the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico. The Companyâ€™s hotel properties include Petro Stopping Centers, TravelCenters of America, Sonesta ES Suites, Wyndham, Country Inn and Suites, Radisson Hotel, Residence Inn, Kimpton, Sonesta, Royal Sonesta, Crowne Plaza, Marriott Hotel, Holiday Inn, InterContinental, Staybridge Suites, SpringHill Suites, Hawthorn Suites, TownePlace Suites, Hyatt Place, Courtyard, Wyndham Grand, Candlewood, and Radisson Blu.
